Question: Amazon.com Services LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Amazon.com Services LLC

CES 2024 Announcements:

- Global partnership with Panasonic to bring Fire TV built in to new smart TVs
- Live demonstration of in-vehicle generative AI capabilities with BMW
- Support for Matter Casting for Fire TV and Echo Show 15 devices
- Display of the latest generation of the Zoox robotaxi
- Siemens' integration of AWS generative AI technology, Amazon Bedrock
- Collaboration with Siemens to make generative AI tools more accessible
- Investment in technologies and startups through Alexa Fund for AI, smart devices, and new media
Summary_cn:
亚马逊服务有限公司

CES 2024公告：

- 与松下的全球合作伙伴关系，将Fire TV内置到新型智能电视中
- 与宝马展示汽车内生成AI能力的现场演示
- 支持Matter Casting技术，适用于Fire TV和Echo Show 15设备
- 展示Zoox机器人出租车的最新一代产品
- 西门子集成AWS生成AI技术，亚马逊贝德洛克
- 与西门子合作，使生成AI工具更易于使用
- 通过Alexa基金为人工智能、智能设备和新媒体投资技术和创业公司
